branchCategory.name: LFK
branchCategory.description: <p>Series LFK flow sensor utilizes Karman Vortex flow sense technology in an inline flow desgn to measure flow rate.  The LFK is an ideal choice for flow sensing applications in which corrosion resistant wetted flow path materials are required.</p>

branchItem.name: LFK, Flow Switch
branchItem.description: <p>Series LFK flow sensor utilizes Karman Vortex flow sense technology in an inline flow desgn to measure flow rate.  The LFK is an ideal choice for flow sensing applications in which corrosion resistant wetted flow path materials are required.</p>
